content.rendered:
Directed by Hansal Mehta.

Written by Apurva Asrani. Ishani Banerjee.

Cast Manoj Bajpayee(Professor Ramchandra Siras). Rajkummar Rao(Deepu Sebastian). Ashish Vidyarthi(Advocate Anand Grover). Balaji Gauri(Nita Grewal). Sukhesh Arora(Tahir Islam). Nutan Surya(Anjali Gopalan). Dilnaz Irani(Namita). Ishwak Singh(Arvind Narayan). Sumit Gulati(Tashi). K.R. Parmeshwar(Prof. Sridharan). Suman Vaidya(Shadab Qureshi). Saptrishi Ghosh(Nita Grewal’s Assistant). Eisha Chopra(Sonali). Farrukh Jaffar(Deepu’s Landlord). Sachin Parikh(Anuj) . Ansh Pandit(Himesh). Naval Shukla(Prathmesh Sharma). Deependra Singh(Katls). Divya Unny(Reporter). Shrikant Verma(Aadil)

Language Hindi.

Producers Sunil Lulla. Zafar Mehdi. Jai Mehta. Aftab Qureshi. Sandeep Singh. Shaailesh R Singh. Alok Tripathi.

Production Karma Pictures.
